resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · Fix: Don't show unknown attribute icons for opencaching.org.uk
 · Fix: Import pocket queries from bookmark lists with umlauts
 · Change: Encrypted log entries are shown encrypted initially
 · New: Invite friends to use c:geo directly from the app
 · Fix: Waypoints imported correctly for GPX from geocheck.org
 · New: Use https for communication with Geokrety
 · Fix: Hide export menu if list does not contain exportable caches
 · Fix: Hide showcase for hint in compass if no hint is available for that cache
 · Fix: Inconsistency in descriptions of user created waypoints
